00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "EdgeIterator.hpp"
00035 
00036 #include <algorithm>
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 
00041 EdgeIterator::EdgeIterator( PatchData* p, MsqError& err )
00042   : patchPtr(p),
00043     vertIdx(0)
00044 {
00045   p->generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00046   if (patchPtr->num_nodes()) {
00047     get_adjacent_vertices( err );
00048     if (adjIter == adjList.end()) {
00049       step(err);
00050       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00051     }
00052   }
00053   else
00054     adjIter = adjList.end();
00055 }
00056 
00057 void EdgeIterator::get_adjacent_vertices( MsqError& err )
00058 {
00059   adjList.clear();
00060   
00061     // Get all adjacent elements
00062   size_t num_elem;
00063   const size_t* elems = patchPtr->get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertIdx, num_elem, err );
00064   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00065   
00066     // Get all adjacent vertices from elements
00067   std::vector<size_t> elem_verts;
00068   for (size_t e = 0; e < num_elem; ++e)
00069   {
00070     MsqMeshEntity& elem = patchPtr->element_by_index(elems[e]);
00071     EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00072     size_t num_edges = TopologyInfo::edges( type );
00073     
00074     bool mid_edge, mid_face, mid_vol;
00075     TopologyInfo::higher_order( type, elem.node_count(), mid_edge, mid_face, mid_vol, err );
00076     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00077     
00078       // For each edge
00079     for (size_t d = 0; d < num_edges; ++d)
00080     {
00081       const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( type, d, err );
00082       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00083       size_t vert1 = elem.get_vertex_index( edge[0] );
00084       size_t vert2 = elem.get_vertex_index( edge[1] );
00085 
00086       size_t mid = ~(size_t)0;
00087       if (mid_edge) {
00088         int p = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( type, elem.node_count(), 1, d, err );
00089         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00090         mid = elem.get_vertex_index_array()[p];
00091       }
00092 
00093         // If this edge contains the input vertex (vert_idx)
00094         // AND the input vertex index is less than the 
00095         // other vertex (avoids iterating over this edge twice)
00096         // add it to the list.
00097       if (vert1 > vert2)
00098       {
00099         if (vert2 == vertIdx)
00100           adjList.push_back( Edge(vert1,mid) );
00101       } 
00102       else 
00103       {
00104         if (vert1 == vertIdx)
00105           adjList.push_back( Edge(vert2,mid) );
00106       }
00107     }
00108   }
00109   
00110     // Remove duplicates
00111   std::sort( adjList.begin(), adjList.end() );
00112   adjIter = std::unique( adjList.begin(), adjList.end() );
00113   adjList.resize( adjIter - adjList.begin() );
00114   adjIter = adjList.begin();
00115 }
